participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Inquisitive and slightly anxious, she often seeks reassurance in conversations.
participant_1.background: Emily is a graphic designer living in a bustling city, and she enjoys exploring art galleries and coffee shops.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Calm and laid-back, he tends to respond thoughtfully and enjoys engaging with others.
participant_2.background: Jake is a software developer who loves hiking and playing guitar in his free time.
